problem_text: (W. Boone and G. Higman) Does every finitely generated group with solvable word problem embed into a finitely presented simple group? It is known that every such group embeds into a simple subgroup of a finitely presented group (W. Boone, G. Higman, J. Austral. Math. Soc., 18, no. 1 (1974), 41–53). J. Belk
